post_title: WTB: Al Shaw or Gilbert Hindu
post_content:
Hi all,

Looking for Gilbert or Shaw hindu for St Louis set.  Potentially open to epdg or old mill.  Probably in the psa 2-4 range but maybe a nice 1, raw and sgc also fine.  

Please feel free to contact if you have one available!

Paul C
Found a shaw hindu! Thanks all!
